Name: Apple Sunrise
Ingredients: 60 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: A pleasing blend of fruits with the apple punch of Calvados.
History: Created in 1980 by Charles Schumann , Munich, Germany.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Sunrise contains 237 calories
